At the Oteybis, the Infecticon pod somehow arrives, as it does it 
lands where the two infecticon deathgliders had landed. A moment 
later the hatch opens and literally launches Blacknightmare from 
inside it. It then closes.

Back at the Chivtron battle, Vampiza twirls off to the left to avoid 
being slashed before he goes about and attempts to slash Windlord 
with his blade of Chaochitan energy twice.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: Could you post Blacknightmare's pod arriving or I should post 
> iit. BTW, what's happened with Zero?
> 
> Windlord:
> 
> Windlord avoided the slash flying up; while he did that he took one 
> of his sharped feathers  and flew towards Vampiza.
> 
> "You fight good, bat-bot" said Windlord
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > OOC: Its a shield. Heh much like the portable shields Yan told me 
a 
> > few chars have. Somewhat like hellpeons but not as potent and 
> strong.
> > 
> > Vampiza twirled to the right to avoid the blasts before he 
swooped 
> > down at windlord as he attempted to impale him with a sword of 
> > Chaochitan energy.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > OOC: If I remember rightly it's against rules intercept fire
> > > 
> > > 
> > > IC:
> > > 
> > > Windlord::
> > > 
> > > "Come on bat-bot"said windlord while he fired 25 times against 
> > > Vampiza"Why don't leave us alone?"
